name: GetSimple-Templates
tagline: Some free HTML 5 themes for use with the GetSimple CMS.
body:
GetSimple-Themes ================ Some free HTML 5 themes for use with the GetSimple CMS. Some are self created, some are just migrated for use with GetSimple-CMS. Currently i have the following themes: - Extreme Simple Theme - Bootstrap GetSimple All licenses you can find in the specfic folder. If there is no license in the specific folder, then the license is 
CC-BY (A Creative-Commons Licnese)
All Desgins are built with:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
